title: Algerian roasted pepper and tomato salad (Felfel b’Tomatich)
ingredients: ['3 large green peppers', '3 large red peppers', '1 small chill pepper (optional)', '1kg tomatoes', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves of garlic, crushed', '¼ teaspoon paprika', '½ teaspoon cumin', '¼ teaspoon turmeric', 'salt and freshly ground pepper']
